content.raw: Also, specific to this branch (it doesn't happen in default), clicking on a moving object with the translate or rotate tool causes the display of that object to freeze. If you click the frozen object with the select tool, it will jump back to its moving state.
content.html: Also, specific to this branch (it doesn't happen in default), clicking on a moving object with the translate or rotate tool causes the display of that object to freeze. If you click the frozen object with the select tool, it will jump back to its moving state.
